LanguageData.Disease_Flu.letterText:
{0} of your {1} have gotten sick from {2}.

Ensure you have a medical bed and a doctor. Make sure that they get proper treatment and spend as much time in bed as possible.

The following {1} have gotten sick:

{3}

LanguageData.ResourcePodCrash.label: resource pod crash
LanguageData.PsychicSoothe.label: psychic soothe
LanguageData.SelfTame.label: self-tame
LanguageData.AmbrosiaSprout.label: ambrosia sprout
LanguageData.AmbrosiaSprout.letterText: A grove of the mysterious ambrosia bush has sprouted nearby! If you wait for the plants to grow, you'll be able to harvest the delicious, pleasurable, and slightly addictive fruit.
LanguageData.FarmAnimalsWanderIn.label: farm animals wander in
LanguageData.WandererJoin.label: wanderer join
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash.label: transport pod crash
LanguageData.ThrumboPasses.label: thrumbos pass
LanguageData.RansomDemand.label: ransom demand
LanguageData.MeteoriteImpact.label: meteorite impact
LanguageData.MeteoriteImpact.letterText: A large meteorite has struck ground in the area. It has left behind a lump of {0}.
LanguageData.HerdMigration.label: herd migration
LanguageData.HerdMigration.letterText: A group of {0} is passing through the area.\n\nThey won't attack unless provoked.
LanguageData.WildManWandersIn.label: wild man wanders in
LanguageData.WildManWandersIn.letterText: A person living among wild animals has wandered into the area. {PAWN_pronoun}'s called {0}.\n\nYou can attempt to tame or arrest {PAWN_objective}.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.label: psychic drone

LanguageData.OrbitalTraderArrival.label: orbital trader arrival
LanguageData.TraderCaravanArrival.label: trader caravan arrival
LanguageData.VisitorGroup.label: visitor group
LanguageData.TravelerGroup.label: traveler group
LanguageData.RaidFriendly.label: friendly raid
LanguageData.StrangerInBlackJoin.label: man in black
LanguageData.StrangerInBlackJoin.letterText: Sensing trouble, a mysterious [PAWN_kind] has arrived.\n\nWill [PAWN_pronoun] be able to set things right in these parts?
LanguageData.RaidEnemy.label: enemy raid
LanguageData.Infestation.label: infestation
LanguageData.Infestation.letterText:
Giant insects are tunneling towards you! They will break through in a few seconds and plant hives.

The hives will spawn more insects and more hives.

If you don't want the insects to infest the whole area, destroy the hives. But beware - the bugs will defend their home.
LanguageData.DeepDrillInfestation.label: deep drill infestation
LanguageData.DeepDrillInfestation.letterText: Vibrations from your deep drills have angered some underground insects. Now they're tunneling upwards to seek revenge!\n\nBeware - the insects have been angered and will try to destroy your base.
LanguageData.ManhunterPack.label: manhunter pack
LanguageData.DefoliatorShipPartCrash.label: ship part crash (defoliator)
LanguageData.DefoliatorShipPartCrash.letterText:
A large piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

Its mysterious influence will kill all plants in an expanding circle around itself.

Destroy it as soon as possible. But beware - it will probably defend itself.
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorShipPartCrash.label: ship part crash (psychic)
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorShipPartCrash.letterText:
A large piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

Your colonists can feel it in the back of their mind, exhorting unspeakable acts. It must have an onboard machine persona with psychic projection ability. And this persona is not friendly.

Destroy it as soon as possible. But beware - it will probably defend itself.
LanguageData.AnimalInsanityMass.label: mass animal insanity
LanguageData.MechCluster.label: mech cluster
LanguageData.MechCluster.letterText:
A mechanoid combat cluster is landing nearby. The cluster will be initially dormant, so you can take time to decide how to attack it.

It may remain dormant until disturbed, or it may have a timer or proximity activators.

Even dormant mech clusters aren't harmless. A dormant cluster may assemble mechanoid attackers from time to time, or have some broader negative effect that must be dealt with eventually.
LanguageData.AnimalInsanitySingle.label: single animal insanity
LanguageData.Eclipse.label: eclipse
LanguageData.SolarFlare.label: solar flare
LanguageData.Aurora.label: aurora
LanguageData.GiveQuest_Random.label: quest
LanguageData.GiveQuest_EndGame_ShipEscape.label: journey offer
